fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Heal (Night): Heal a player, granting Powerful defense and curing poison, bleeding, or other similar effects.
-Self-Heal (Night): Heal yourself, 1 use.
-Anti-Heal (Night): Cause a player to bleed. They will die in two nights unless healed. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Your target will be notified if they were bled.
